Name: Cornflake Crisis
About the game: Get a great start to your day with crispy, nutritious platforming! Embark on an a-maize-ing adventure as a team of happy-go-lucky cereal flakes on a quest to recover the legendary Cornucopia. Be More Spoontaneous! Swap between a wide variety of playable cornflakes with unique abilities and attributes as you traverse 2D platforming worlds bursting with colour, humour, and weird characters! Cornquer the Grub Kingdom Explore all sorts of food-inspired environments filled with wonder and really stupid puns, including the Broccoli Forest, the Dessert Dungeon and a Haunted Gingerbread House! Reclaim the Cornucopia The ancient relic that ensures the peace and tranquility of the cornflake lifestyle has been seized by a mysterious newcomer named Bandit - don’t let him get away with it! Corny and hand-drawn-y A painstaking, entirely hand-illustrated game made as the result of more than two years of love and dedication from a solo developer! Cob A Load Of This Ride a carrot rocket, prove your prowess at grillin’ sausages and help a banana build a sandcastle! Live In Corncert Fortified with an awesome and funky original soundtrack that will put a smile on your face!
